      Returns:

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String username, String firstName, String lastName, String password)
      Adds a new user in the application, the id will be generated automatically
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the new user
      firstName - the first name of the new user
      lastName - the last name of the new user
      password - the password of the new user
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the user is invalid
      ServiceException - if the user could not be added

    • modifyUser

      public void modifyUser(Long id, String firstName, String lastName, String password)
      Modifies an existing user in the application
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user to be modified
      firstName - the new first name of the user
      lastName - the new last name of the user
      password - the new password of the user
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the new data provided is invalid
      ServiceException - if the user could not be updated

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(Long id)
      Deletes a user from the application
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if the user could not be deleted
